attributes.action: amend the law forbidding the use of mobile phones in cars so that it does not apply to those calling 999.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: For the last nine months I have been driving around the M25 from J15 to J22, around 20 miles or so.  On 3 or 4 occasions I have called 999 to report minor accidents or breakdowns which have occured in front of me.  Never again.  The law should be changed so that calling 999 while driving is not a criminal offence.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
